amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part A of House Report 117-225 to require the VA to inform new veterans of the medical care and services for which they are eligible, including community care under the MISSION Act; mental health care, including the Veterans Crisis Line; care relating to military sexual trauma; and any other information the Secretary deems appropriate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A002) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Ms. Ross.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ross amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
